summary: The ancient Egypt Mummy, Kharis, is transported from his homeland with the high priest Mehemet to wreak vengeance on the family who has defiled the sacred tomb of his beloved Princess Ananka.
cast: Lon Chaney Jr.|Dick Foran|John Hubbard|Elyse Knox|George Zucco|Wallace Ford|Turhan Bey|Virginia Brissac|Cliff Clark|Mary Gordon|Paul E. Burns|Frank Reicher|Emmett Vogan|Sig Arno|Brandon Beach|Leon Belasco|Walter Byron|Noble 'Kid' Chissell|Harry Cording|James Crane|Grace Cunard|Frank Darien|Fern Emmett|Francis Ford|Vinton Hayworth|Otto Hoffman|Dick Hogan|Cecil Kellaway|Lew Kelly|Rex Lease|Charles Marsh|Mira McKinney|Patrick McVey|Peggy Moran|Bob Reeves|John Rogers|William Ruhl|Janet Shaw|Glenn Strange|Charles Trowbridge|Tom Tyler|Guy Usher|Eddy Waller
title: La tumba de la momia
